definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
at a distance of/distance/to be apart
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Set the camera for a long-distance shot.
sentences.chinese: 调好相机，拍一张远距离的照片。

sentences.english: Devastators should be used to decimate infantry and attack units at very long ranges.
sentences.chinese: 毁灭战舰应该被用于远距离大批屠杀步兵和攻击单位。

sentences.english: The geomagnetic orientation is one of the important mechanisms for orientation of insects in the long distance migration.
sentences.chinese: 地磁定向是昆虫远距离迁飞定向的重要机制之一。

sentences.english: The synoptic model of the far distance tropical cyclone torrential rainfalls in Shandong province was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了山东省远距离热带气旋暴雨的天气学模型。

sentences.english: At distance, Bulwer's Petrel appears to be uniform black.
sentences.chinese: 在远距离之下，穴鸟呈现一致的黑色。

sentences.english: Distinctive orange handle indicates "open/close" and direction of flow at a distance.
sentences.chinese: 独特的橙色手柄可以远距离指示“启闭”和流体方向。

sentences.english: In turn, the uncover map allows you to activate every teleport.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，开启的地图将允许你激活远距离移动物体。

sentences.english: Distinctive red handle indicates "open/close" and direction of flow at a distance.
sentences.chinese: 特别的红色手柄能够远距离表示“启闭”和流向。

sentences.english: The station is only a dream. It constantly outdistances us.
sentences.chinese: 车站只是一个梦，距离我们很远距离的梦。

sentences.english: Over five years ago, scientists succeeded in teleporting information.
sentences.chinese: 5年前，科学家成功实现了远距离传输信息。

sentences.english: Is this someone who has seen a face at night or at a distance?
sentences.chinese: 他是在夜间或在远距离上见过那张脸吗？

sentences.english: Myopia (nearsightedness) is an abnormal elongation of the eye, causing distant objects to appear blurred.
sentences.chinese: 近视是视力不正常的伸长，使远距离的物体模糊不清。

sentences.english: The bow can shoot the target in the distance only when stretched to its full extent.
sentences.chinese: 只有拉满弓才能射得到那么远距离的靶子。

sentences.english: And then there's distance diagnosis, which is digitally done.
sentences.chinese: 并且有用作远距离诊断的数码设备。

sentences.english: Bow and crossbow is the most in common use in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 弓弩是古代最常用的远距离作战武器。

sentences.english: The weapon is heavy, takes long time to be assembled, and has a poor accuracy at longer distance.
sentences.chinese: 武器沉重，花长时间装配，而且在较远距离精度低。

definition: to hide oneself/invisible (person or online status)
individual soldier/(literary) isolated military unit, cut off from reinforcements
